name: Air 1.0
description: Its fresh air from the middle of the city! Its 200ml of air per bag. Best product ever!

name: Air 2.0
description: This time its fresh air from the jungle, we had a lot of complains that Air 1.0 is full of co2. Now its the best prouct ever!

name: Pokeman
description: Its Pokeman! Not Pokemon. Its 1000x better than pokemon. Catch them all!
